channel.title: Metallica?
channel.description: Anyone here a fan? If so what's you're favorite album or song.

item.title: Metallica?
item.dc:creator: @ruzylo Ruzylo
item.description:
@ruzylo wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:15, topic:539219”]OP: for whom the bell tolls?? no remorse??? metal militia??? JUMP IN THE FIRE??? if we’re going to talk about metallica we might as well not talk about their generic overplayed shit[/quote]THIS. I like all there songs but enter sandman, but the less known and over player songs are so much better.

Read full topic

item.title: Metallica?

item.description:

item.title: Metallica?
item.dc:creator: @ruzylo Ruzylo
item.description:
@ruzylo wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:3, topic:539219”][quote author=Docent link=topic=658052.msg4401680#msg4401680 date=1390788794]
Used to be. Then it was too weak for me. But i liked seek and destroy, nothing else matters, sad but true, eye of the beholder. Black album.
[/quote]
this
and

ENTER SANDMAN[/quote]Enter sandman was overplayed to shit and much to overrated now. Its their only song I cannot stand.

Read full topic

item.title: Metallica?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:8, topic:539219”]I used to be like docent, but all of that “brutal technical death metal” stuff starts to get old after awhile, expand your horizons.

OT: No I hate metallica because they dissed my favorite vocalist of all time layne staley, I don’t enjoy any of their music but the “Kill Em’ All” album.[/quote]

Well I listen to Ensiferum, Korpiklaani, Finntroll, Deicide

Read full topic

item.title: Metallica?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

I used to be like docent, but all of that “brutal technical death metal” stuff starts to get old after awhile, expand your horizons.

OT: No I hate metallica because they dissed my favorite vocalist of all time layne staley, I don’t enjoy any of their music but the “Kill Em’ All” album.

item.title: Metallica?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:6, topic:539219”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=658052.msg4401697#msg4401697 date=1390790873]

Used to be. Then it was too weak for me. But i liked seek and destroy, nothing else matters, sad but true, eye of the beholder. Black album.

you seem to think everything is too “weak” what exactly do you like? if it’s screaming you’d love living at my house, 4 little girls all day screaming their fudgeing heads off. still too weak?
[/quote]

Ryley we’ve had our discussion about this on skype like a year ago.

but docent I means theres a difference between fast pace and wierd[/quote]

i dont understand what you said.

Read full topic
